vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ATokenInterfaces.sol#123-185) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ATokenInterfaces.sol#149)
	-transferFrom (ATokenInterfaces.sol#163)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in ATokenInterfaces.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (ATokenInterfaces.sol#3): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (ATokenInterfaces.sol#83): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (ATokenInterfaces.sol#116): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (ATokenInterfaces.sol#189): it allows old versions
